Package picard.annotation

Class Summary
Gene Holds annotation of a gene for storage in an OverlapDetector.
GeneAnnotationReader Load gene annotations into an OverlapDetector of Gene objects.
RefFlatReader Loads gene annotations from a refFlat file into an OverlapDetector.
 

Enum Summary
LocusFunction Describes the behavior of a locus relative to a gene.
RefFlatReader.RefFlatColumns  
 

Exception Summary
AnnotationException Exception thrown when loading gene annotations.
